title: Fragment, 1902-1-561, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: supplementary warp forming raised pile in plain weave foundation (velvet) with supplementary wefts
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description:
Sprigs of large leaf and small flower in green velvet facing in alternate direction on white faced with silver.
Curved shapes as if the piece was a fragment from a chasuble.
